name: Azulejo
description:
Azulejo

A Sliding Tile Puzzle inspired in Portuguese Ceramic Tiles known as Azulejos. 

Move the tiles around into the empty slot until you can put the Azulejo pattern together correctly.

Controls
  • Click a tile to select it, then
  • Click the empty slot to move the tile into that slot

Game for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5 with the theme "Your Country's History".

Credits

All assets created by me unless stated below.

Font: Gabriela (Google Fonts)
